channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

Report X-2024020016

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO MULTIPLE WET AND FROZEN PKGS IN A TRAILER AT AROUND DOOR 6 UNLOAD. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THIS PACKAGE APPEARED FROZEN CAUSING JUGS TO EXPAND AND LEAK FROM SEALED CAPS.

item.title: Report X-2024010715
item.description:
Report X-2024010715

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-06T18:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: BURLINGTON
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered by workers to be wet and having an odor. Trained personal retrieved the package and proceeded to inspect. Proper procedures implemented to handle package according to FedEx policy. DescribePack: Package was inadequately prepared to hold and brace material. No packing. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: No spilled material presented for clean up. Package contained in proper Hazmat bucket lined with heavy duty plastic bag.

item.title: Report X-2024010559
item.description:
Report X-2024010559

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-05T15:13:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 1/5/2024, at approximately 1400, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 240946 at the station location in Spokane, reporting an undeclared battery sihpment. The package contains an electric lawnmower, powered by lithium battery. The package was orginally tendered with a UN 3481 marked on the package. The shipment was rejected and the shipper was contracted for retrieval. The shipper returned the shipment with the previous marking partially crossed out and declared the shipment unregulated. Further investigation confirmed that the contents inside was indeed an electric lawnmover, packed with a lithium battery. The shipment was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations. The shipment is being held, pending an investgation by the FAA.

item.description:

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to IC roller when it was noticed package was leaking, QA was called over to cleanup mess and inspect package, DescribePack: Cap of bottle came off causing foil seal to break and release fluid throughout box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in hazmat tote and absorbent placed over spilled area
